extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: CHEM221 and CHEM223 or CHEE 210 and CHEM (ENCH) 245

basic.description: Four topics covering a range of self-assembled molecular systems will be discussed: monolayers and bilayers, block co-polymers, nanoparticles, and liquid crystals. Material properties, synthetic methods and application of these systems in current and emerging technologies, including nanotechnologies, will be covered.
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Self Assembly and Materials
